entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 7 RC1 ASP.Net Core Output Caching: Memory leak in MemoryOutputCacheStore? #44169
  • `[directory]` not shown in installation bundle help #44167
  • ContentRangeHeaderValue "to" must always be less than "length" #44166
  • PWA Blazor doesn't work when I use Multiple hosted ASP.NET Core Blazor WebAssembly apps #44164
  • Get child tag by name #44163
  • Varied Messages for Unauthorized in AuthorizeRouteView for a specific authorization policy/role #44162
  • Mapping Exception x StatusCode in ExceptionHandlerMiddleware #44156

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Remove Kevin from CodeOwners #44160
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/3.1] Remove Kevin from CodeOwners #44159
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/2.1] Remove Kevin from CodeOwners #44158
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Remove Kevin from CodeOwners #44161
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/7.0] Update spa-templates to ref new 7.0 branch #44134
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, feature-spa, feature-templates, 7.0.0

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #44152
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc2' => 'release/7.0' #44135
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2002995 #43956
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix ANCM hosting bundle conditions for older OS #44155
  • [release/7.0] Update Roslyn Versions #44148
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor wasm] Use provided loadBootResource function to override how config is loaded #43969
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Remove attributes from SVG elements #43957
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Update Roslyn versions #44072
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 7.0.0
  • Annotate WebAssembly.Authentication for nullability #43442
    area-blazor
